entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json.JsonException: Reference '{#}' was not found. #99881
  • MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewAccessor throws System.UnauthorizedAccessException: Access to the path is denied. #99879
  • Missing Enum constraint on JsonNumberEnumConverter<TEnum> in reference assembly #99878
  • Android: Installed X509 certificates can't be used with SSL authentication #99874

Closed

  • The `Dispose(bool)` seems not implemented correctly #99877
    Future
  • FreeBSD 13 jail: Failed to create CoreCLR: HRESULT: 0x8007054f #99857
  • [API Proposal]: Add MonthOnly type #99751

PullRequests

Created

  • fix ping with TTL on Linux #99875
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 122.0.6261.128, windows: 122.0.6261.129 #99873
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Convert GetCurrentMethod to QCALL #99852
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Avoid using native layout info to calculate register flags for small structs where possible. #99854
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [Fix] pr-guide.md broken link to area-owners.md #99876
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Updated

  • [NativeAOT/x86] Load RtlRestoreContext dynamically and add fallback for old OSes #99813
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove invalid Unsafe.As from array helpers #99778
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ILCompiler: Fix values of IsSupported for HW intrinsics on 32-bit platforms #99753
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • Dynamic event support #99862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold always false type checks #99761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold const index access for static readonly string #99562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add additional checks to optimization of constant static field loads #99845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
